In a 2015 event: then-candidate Donald Trump made a statement saying "I don't like losers" about then-Sen. John McCain, R-Ariz.
After the 2015 event: Trump tweeted a web post with the headline "Donald Trump: John McCain Is 'A Loser'" to promote the exchange.
The Atlantic article published on Septem: 2020, reported anonymous sources claiming that Trump referred to McCain as a "loser" and expressed anger over flags being lowered to half-staff for his funeral. Trump vehemently denied these claims on Twitter.
